traits.name: Grave Magic
entries: When the master of souls cast a spell that deals damage, it can change the spell's damage type to necrotic.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The master of souls attacks twice with its flail.

actions.name: Silvered Skull Flail
entries: Melee atk +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d8 damage) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6 damage) necrotic damage, and the target has disadvantage on all saving throws until the end of the master of souls' next turn.

actions.name: Chill Touch (Cantrip)
entries: Ranged Spell atk +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. 13 (2d8 damage) necrotic damage, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of the master of souls' next turn. If the target is undead, it has disadvantage on attack rolls against the master of souls for the same duration.

actions.name: Ray of Sickness (1st-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)
entries: Ranged Spell atk +6 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. 9 (2d8 damage) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the end of the master of souls' next turn. If the master of souls casts this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.

actions.name: Scorching Ray (2nd-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)
entries: Ranged Spell atk +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target per ray (3 rays if a 2nd-level spell slot is used, 4 rays if a 3rd-level spell slot is used). 7 (2d6 damage) fire damage per ray.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The master of souls is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared:
